subject: Art & Design
title: Kerning: The Space Between Letters
description: Learn Kerning: The Space Between Letters in one minute.

hook.text: Look at the word 'WAVE.' The space between W and A feels wider than between A and V. That's a kerning problem.

buildup.text: Kerning is adjusting the space between individual letter pairs so spacing looks visually even.

discovery.text: Optical spacing â‰  mathematical spacing. Diagonal letters (A, V, W) need tighter gaps to look right.

twist.text: Bad kerning can be disastrous: 'click' can look like a very different word with poor letter spacing.

climax.text: Professional fonts include kerning tables â€” pre-set adjustments for hundreds of letter pairs.

punchline.text: Good kerning is invisible. Bad kerning is unforgettable.

quiz.question: What is kerning?
options: Adjusting space between individual letter pairs
